explanation: [0-0] A lady is standing in a living room, wearing a fuchsia ballet tutu and a rose T-shirt, with her hair in two ponytails and a floral headband. She has a bright smile on her face and is covering her mouth with her right hand while raising her left thumb. The background features a metal dining table with three black chairs beside it, white walls, and an off-white ceiling fan.

[0-5] Then, the lady puts down her right hand, but a green dot appears where her hand covered her mouth. A green line appears on her nose, and by squatting and swaying her body, she draws a heart shape on the screen.
